code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import Header from"../components/Header";import Label from"../components/Label";import CuponContext from"../context/CuponContext";import{categorias}from"../data/categorias";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Categorias(){var _useContext=useContext(CuponContext),categoria=_useContext.categoria,setCategoria=_useContext.setCategoria;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{children:categorias.map(function(e){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{onClick:function onClick(){return setCategoria(function(prevCategoria){return prevCategoria===e.id?"":e.id;});},className:categoria===e.id&&"active",children:e.name},e.id);})});}export default Categorias;
